SEARCH
Package Doctor.Controller

Class DoctorController

java.lang.Object
Doctor.Controller.DoctorController
public class DoctorController extends Object
DoctorController class provides operations for managing doctor-related functionality. Includes methods for managing doctors, accessing medical records, generating prescriptions, and interacting with the repositories.

  • Method Details

    • getAllDoctors

      public static List<Doctor> getAllDoctors()
      Retrieves a list of all doctors.
      Returns:
      A list of all Doctor entities.

    • createDoctorFromUser

      public static Doctor createDoctorFromUser(User user)
      Creates a Doctor object from the given User object by retrieving the doctor information.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object representing the doctor.
      Returns:
      The created Doctor object, or null if the doctor is not found.

    • viewPatientRecord

      public static List<MedicalRecord> viewPatientRecord(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves a list of all medical records associated with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor entity whose records are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord entities, or null if the doctor is null.

    • viewSpecificPatientRecord

      public static List<MedicalRecord> viewSpecificPatientRecord(Doctor doctor, String patientId)
      Retrieves medical records for a specific patient assigned to a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor entity responsible for the patient.
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of MedicalRecord entities, or null if no records are found.

    • addPatientRecord

      public static MedicalRecord addPatientRecord(MedicalRecord record)
      Adds a new medical record to the repository.
      Parameters:
      record - The MedicalRecord entity to be added.
      Returns:
      The created MedicalRecord entity.

    • updatePatientRecord

      public static void updatePatientRecord(MedicalRecord entity)
      Updates an existing medical record in the repository.
      Parameters:
      entity - The MedicalRecord entity to update.

    • generatePrescription

      public static void generatePrescription(Prescription prescription, Appointment appointment)
      Generates a new prescription for a given appointment and stores it in the repository.
      Parameters:
      prescription - The Prescription entity to be created.
      appointment - The Appointment entity associated with the prescription.

    • viewPrescriptionsByDoctor

      public static List<Prescription> viewPrescriptionsByDoctor(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves all prescriptions associated with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor entity whose prescriptions are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Prescription entities, or null if the doctor is null.

    • updatePrescriptionStatus

      public static void updatePrescriptionStatus(String prescriptionId, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of a specific prescription.
      Parameters:
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription to update.
      newStatus - The new status to set.

    • getDoctorById

      public static Doctor getDoctorById(String id)
      Retrieves a Doctor entity by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the doctor.
      Returns:
      The Doctor entity with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • deleteDoctorById

      public static boolean deleteDoctorById(String id)
      Deletes a doctor by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the doctor to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the doctor was successfully deleted, otherwise false.
